Metaphor v0.5.0 Release Date: 06/09/16

New Features:

  1. Added Modals
Improvements:
  1. Updated details on Github Workflow to Contribution Guidelines
  2. Updated details on Semantic Version to Contribution Guidelines
  3. Updated details on Issue Tracking to Contribution Guidelines
  4. Updated setup details on Github Landing Page

Metaphor v0.4.0 Release Date: 06/08/16

New Features:

  1. Added jQuery UI Datepicker

Metaphor v0.3.0 Release Date: 06/07/16

New Features:

  1. Added Panels Components
  2. Added Roadmap Page for Components
Improvements:
  1. Updated Variables To Support All CSUN Brand Colors
  2. Added Support for Small Headers
  3. Refactored Codebase

Metaphor v0.2.0 Release Date: 05/24/16

New Features:

  1. Added Form Field Components
